definition: Jente township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]
Jente township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan

sentences.english: To not follow the truly humane will bring immeasurable harm.
sentences.chinese: 要是不親熱有仁德的人，那將帶給咱們如許大的壞處。

sentences.english: Jen-Teh Junior College of Medicine, Nursing and Management FirstSemester, 2009 …
sentences.chinese: 仁德醫護管理專科學校九十八學年度第二學期。

sentences.english: The Master said, "If a man is not humane, what can he do with the rituals?"
sentences.chinese: 孔子說，“做人卻沒有仁德，他怎麼能實行禮呢？

sentences.english: To follow the truly humane will bring immeasurable good.
sentences.chinese: 如果能親近有仁德的人，那將帶給我們多麼大的好處。

sentences.english: I do not know about his being humane, but what does he need eloquence for?
sentences.chinese: 他有沒有仁德，我不清楚，但何必要能說會道呢？

definition: Renai or Jenai district of Keelung City 基隆市[Ji1 long2 shi4], Taiwan/Renai or Jenai township in Nantou county 南投縣|南投县[Nan2 tou2 xian4], central Taiwan

to love the common people as one's own children (praise for a virtuous ruler)

Xinyi or Hsinyi district of Taipei City 臺北市|台北市[Tai2 bei3 shi4], Taiwan/Xinyi or Hsini district of Keelung City 基隆市[Ji1 long2 shi4], Taiwan/Xinyi or Hsini township in Nantou county 南投縣|南投县[Nan2 tou2 xian4], central Taiwan
